meanings.sent1: The bipedal dinosaur stood tall on its two feet.
meanings.sent2: The bipedal robot moved gracefully on its two feet.
meanings.sent3: The bipedal penguin waddled comically on the ice with its two feet.
meanings.sent4: The bipedal tree swayed gently in the wind on its two feet.
meanings.sent5: The bipedal toddler took its first steps confidently on its two feet.

meanings.sent1: The bipedal alien explored the new planet on its two feet.
meanings.sent2: The bipedal human walked steadily on its two feet.
meanings.sent3: The bipedal robot danced awkwardly on the stage with its two feet.
meanings.sent4: The bipedal shadow followed closely behind on its two feet.
meanings.sent5: The bipedal bear roamed the forest silently on its two feet.
